activities: Personal information is received to authenticate the customer, for billing identification and for delivering the Intraboom service. The specific information collected comprises the name, password, date of birth and email address of the customer. Optional information that a customer may submit comprises gender, company name, mobile number and photo. Setting up a paid account requires collection of credit card information and a billing address. Credit card information is securely passed to Intraboom's payment processing partner and is not stored with Intraboom.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data- manually and electronically processed
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
